name: Linkup
description: A web application that lets users create a page where they can feature multiple links to their content and social profiles so their audience can find them easily.The app allows for customization, so users can design their page in keeping up with their brand.
label: Link Sharing Simplified!

study.heading: Linkup
study.about: Linkup is a web application for creating a social media landing page. The web app helps creators provide their audience with multiple links to their content all over the internet.
study.process: I began working on the project by designing and prototyping a fully responsive UI in Adobe XD. The UI & UX development was done with React and additional modules such as Styled Components and React Router. I used Firebase for the backend processes such as authorization, database and storage.

name: Winnipeg Transit Live
description: Winnipeg Transit Live helps you find buses passing by stops around you. Find out if your bus is arriving on-time, early or late easily. Get a live update on upcoming bus schedules at nearby stops.
label: Realtime Bus Times!

study.heading: Winnipeg Transit Live
study.about: Winnipeg Transit Live is a real-time transit app I first built as a studio-project in college to help with my daily commutes. The design is simple none intrusive delivering accurate information on time.
study.process: I started sketching a wireframe for the app and refined it using Figma. Once I was satisfied with my design, I moved to prototype to better understand the functionality and technical requirements to come. I made sure to get familiar with Winnipeg Transitâ€™s API before developing the user interface. I decided to build the UI with React, Ionic and Sass. Once the app was ready, I implemented Google AdMob for iOS and Android and deployed it in app stores and a dedicated domain as a Progressive Web App.

name: Stoic Widgets
description: iOS 14 widget app built using React Native and Swift. Stoic Widget provides a daily dose of insightful quotes to help users practice and embody stoic virtues throughout their day.
label: iOS Widget

study.heading: Stoic Widgets
study.about: Stoic Widgets is an iOS 14 widget app that provides a daily dose of insightful quotes to help users practice and embody stoic virtues. With 900+ installs, Stoic Widgets is my biggest app yet.
study.process: I designed the user interface of Stoic Widgets with Figma, then moved to develop the host app with React Native, Styled Components and React Navigation. Once the host app was ready, I started creating the iOS widgets using Swift and Widget Kit. I integrated with the app Firebase and Microsoft AppCenter for updating the home feed content and the app itself.
